nodes.text: The 2R-series medical droid was a medical droid manufactured by Cybot Galactica. The RH-series research droid, a science droid also produced by Cybot Galactica, was a variant of the 2R-series medical droid.
The 2R-series medical droid was mentioned in Fully Operational, a 2018 sourcebook for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
